original_text: No one could distinguish the sound of the shouts of joy from the sound of weeping, because the people made so much noise. And the sound was heard far away.
korean_text: 백성이 크게 외치는 소리가 멀리 들리므로 즐거이 부르는 소리와 통곡하는 소리를 백성들이 분간하지 못하였더라

sentences.original_text: the sound of the shouts of joy
because the people made so much noise
sentences.korean_translation: 백성들이 너무 많은 소리를 냈기 때문이었다

sentences.original_text: And the sound was heard far away
